Kaboni wa Yehova uyo waleka kupharazgira ŵanji panji kusopa na Ŵakhristu ŵanyake, tikuleka yayi kumuyowoyeska. Kweni tikumwendera na kumovwira kuti wayambireso kuchita vinthu vyauzimu. Kaboni uyo wachita kwananga kukuru, tikumuwuskamo bweka yayi mu mpingo. Kweni para wakuswa fundo za mu Baibolo mwadala ndipo wakupera yayi, tikumuwuskamo mu mpingo ndipo tikuleka kumuyowoyeska. Baibolo likuti: “Fumyanimo munthu muheni mukati mwinu. ”—1 Ŵakorinte 5:13. Kasi vikwenda wuli para mwanalume ŵamuwuskamo mu mpingo kweni muwoli na ŵana ŵake ŵachali Ŵakaboni ŵa Yehova? Ubali ukumara yayi, kweni ubali wauzimu ndiwo ukusintha. Nthengwa yikulutilira kweniso wakulutilira kuchita vinthu vinyake na mbumba yake. Ŵanthu awo tili kuŵawuskamo mu mpingo ŵangasopa nase. Usange ŵakukhumba, ŵangapokera ulongozgi wauzimu ku ŵalara ŵa mpingo. Chilato ntchakuti tiŵawovwire kuti ŵawelere mu mpingo. Para ŵasintha nkharo yawo ndipo ŵakukhumba kulondezga fundo za mu Baibolo, tikuŵapokelera.

Ivyo Baibolo likuyowoya Luka, uyo wakalembako nkhani ya Yesu, wakati: “Nasanda vinthu vyose makoraghene kufuma pakwamba. ”—Luka 1:3. Ŵanthu ŵanyake ŵakuti nkhani ya Yesu iyo yili mu mabuku gha Mateyu, Mariko, Luka na Yohane, ŵali kuyisintha m’ma 300 C.E. Kweni m’ma 1900 C.E., mpukutu unyake wa buku la Yohane ukasangika ku Egypt. Zina la mpukutu uwu ni Papyrus Rylands 457 (P52). Uli ku layibulare ya John Rylands, ku Manchester, England. Muli mazgu gha pa Yohane 18:31-33, 37, 38. Mpukutu uwu ngwakale chomene. Ŵanthu ŵanyake ŵakuti ukalembeka m’ma 125 C.E. Pakwenera kuti pakajumpha vyaka 25 kufuma apo buku la Yohane likalembekera. Mazgu agho ghali mu mpukutu uwu, ghakuyana na agho ghali mu mipukutu yinyake ya buku la Yohane iyo yikalembeka pamanyuma pa 125 C.E.
